name: Loaded Shooter
shortDescription: A thrilling 2D side-scrolling run-and-gun game where a lone hero battles enemies, armored units, and massive bosses.
fullDescription:
Loaded Shooter is an action-packed 2D side-scrolling run-and-gun game. Take control of a heavily armed hero and fight through waves of enemies across war-torn streets, industrial bases, and military installations.

Key Features:

  • Classic Arcade Action: Enjoy fast-paced, responsive run-and-gun gameplay inspired by arcade classics.
  • Diverse Combat: Face foot soldiers, heavily armored units, and vehicles like trucks, helicopters, and tanks.
  • Epic Boss Battles: Challenge colossal bosses, from attack helicopters to jet fighters, each with unique attack patterns.
  • Score & Upgrade System: Collect coins and resources to upgrade your weapons and improve your score performance.
  • Immersive Environments: Explore diverse zones, including urban streets, industrial complexes, and fortified military bases.
